summary:
Today's FiftyIn50 blog challenge question is:
What is the funniest book or TV show with which you are familiar. 
When it comes to fiction, I read mostly scifi and crime fiction which are definitely not funny.  But occasionally, you come across an author who manages to be droll or witty, or have a character that extol those virtues...
